sense.def:
A party
je družabni dogodek, pri katerem se ljudje sprostijo ob hrani, pijači, plesu, pogovoru ali igrah.

seg.quote: They gave a farewell party for her.

sense.def:
V politiki je
a party
organizacija, ki si prizadeva, da bi bili njeni člani izvoljeni v parlament.

seg.quote: He's a member of the Labour Party.

sense.def:
A party of people
je skupina ljudi, ki nekaj delajo skupaj, na primer potujejo.

seg.quote: ...a party of Americans on a tour.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
is a party to an action or agreement
, sodeluje pri dejanju ali sporazumu in je zato delno odgovoren zanj.

seg.quote: They wouldn't be a party to such a ridiculous enterprise.
